Can you describe the exact and specific issue you're having?  Happy to help?  I'd like to hear your specific issue, while symptoms sound similar it doesn't mean the issue is the same.  Let me know!

It seems that you're having a network problem that's failing to establish a connection with our authentication server, which would prevent you from logging in.  I suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get that fixed up!  Let me know if you have any questions.
